messages.title: OUR KEY PLEDGES
messages.content: Act now on debt to get the economy moving and deal with the deficit. Take Britain back to being the enterprise capital of Europe. Make Britain the most family-friendly country in Europe.

messages.title: DANGERS OF A HUNG PARLIAMENT
messages.content: It is a landmark election. The risk is real and your vote matters. Voting then requires a stable government with the energy and ideas to get Britain moving. That's why a hung parliament would be risky for Britain. It means Gordon Brown could carry on as Prime Minister. Only a Conservative victory will bring real change.

keyPolicies.policyDescription: Act now on debt to get the economy moving and deal with the deficit.
Take Britain back to being the enterprise capital of Europe.
Make Britain the most family-friendly country in Europe.

mentions.tacticalSituation: Only a Conservative victory will bring real change.

issues.economy: Act now on debt to get the economy moving and deal with the deficit.
issues.education: Raise standards in schools. Give teachers the power to restore discipline, and create more smaller schools.
issues.governance: Change politics. Reduce the number of MPs, cut Whitehall and quangos by a third, and stop taxpayer's money being used to bring in activists.
issues.health: Back the NHS. Increase spending on health every year, and make the NHS work for patients not managers.
issues.immigration: Take action to stop Labour's open door policy on immigration. Quota on EU immigrants, a dedicated border police force and better protection.

images.caption: David Pinder working for you in Totley
Your Conservative team - David and Nicola
Nicola leading our campaign team on the NHS

leaflet.additionalNotes: Work with councils to freeze council tax, raise the basic state pension, recognise marriage in the tax system, and back our troops in the field. Curb benefit abuse by migrating people from welfare into work.
